title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register using a valid email and password and complete email verification to activate the account.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign Up page from the Landing Page
Enter valid email, password, and confirm password
Submit the registration form
Receive verification email and click verification link
Account should be activated and user redirected to Onboarding Wizard

title: User Login with Email/Password
description: Ensure existing users can login successfully with valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page from the Landing Page
Input registered email and correct password
Click Login button
User should be authenticated and redirected to Dashboard

title: User Login with OAuth Providers
description: Verify login functionality using supported OAuth providers such as Google and Microsoft.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Click 'Login with Google' button
Complete OAuth flow successfully
User should be authenticated and taken to Dashboard

title: Password Reset Functionality
description: Ensure users can request a password reset email and successfully reset their password.

steps.description: Navigate to Password Reset page
Enter registered email and submit request
Receive password reset email and click link
Enter a new valid password and submit
Password reset succeeds and user can login with new password

title: Dashboard Loading and Sidebar Navigation
description: Verify that after login, the Dashboard loads with metrics overview and sidebar navigation works correctly.

steps.description: Login successfully and reach Dashboard
Dashboard overview widgets are visible with correct data
Use sidebar to navigate to Cookies, DPDPA, Reports, and Settings
Each selected section loads correctly without errors

title: Automated Cookie Scanning with Accurate Classification
description: Validate that the cookie scanning feature scans the website, classifies cookies with over 95% accuracy, and displays results for review and saving.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → Cookies → Scan Website
Enter target website URL and start scan
Cookies are listed with automatic classification
Classification accuracy should be above 95%
Edit cookie classifications manually
Save edited results
Saved classifications persist and can be reviewed later

title: Cookie Banner Customization and Widget Deployment
description: Confirm that users can customize cookie banners, preview changes, generate banner code, and deploy widget correctly.

steps.description: Go to Dashboard → Cookies → Customize Banner
Adjust banner text, colors, and behavior settings
Preview the customized banner
Banner preview matches customization settings
Generate widget code
Embed widget code in sample website environment
Banner displays and functions as customized on sample site

title: DPDPA Consent Processing Activities Setup with Industry Templates
description: Test setup of data processing activities using pre-built industry-specific templates and manual adjustments.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → DPDPA → Activities
Select an industry template and apply it
Template processing activities populate correctly
Modify individual processing activity details
Save the activities configuration
Saved activities are persisted and retrievable

title: DPDPA Consent Widget Configuration and Consent Collection
description: Validate configuration of the DPDPA consent widget, code generation, embedding, and end-user granular consent collection.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → DPDPA → Widget Configuration
Configure widget settings and generate embedding code
Embed widget code on test site
Visit the test site as an end user
Consent notice is displayed with activity review
Provide granular consent selections and submit
Unique Consent ID is generated and consent is recorded accurately

title: Consent ID Verification and Cross-Device Preference Sync
description: Ensure end-users can verify their Consent ID on a new device and previously given preferences load correctly with error handling.

steps.description: On a different device, navigate to Consent ID verification input
Enter a valid Consent ID and submit
User preferences are loaded and reflected correctly
Enter invalid or malformed Consent ID
Appropriate error message is displayed and verification denied

title: Analytics Dashboard with Filtering and Data Export
description: Test that real-time consent trends, device and geographic breakdowns display correctly and reports export in supported formats.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → Reports
Consent trends and charts for device and geographic breakdowns load accurately
Apply filters based on date range, device type, and region
Charts refresh and reflect filtered data correctly
Export reports in PDF and CSV formats
Exported files are generated without errors and contain accurate data

title: Audit Trail Viewing and Export
description: Verify complete audit logs can be searched by criteria and exported as compliance reports in multiple formats.

steps.description: Go to Dashboard → Audit
Search audit trail using filters like date, user, and action
Audit records matching criteria are displayed with complete details
Generate export of audit records in CSV and PDF
Exported files accurately reflect the audit data queried

title: Privacy Centre Consent Management and Data Subject Rights Requests
description: Test that end-users can access Privacy Centre, manage their consents, and submit data subject rights requests successfully.

steps.description: Visit Privacy Centre via provided widget link
Privacy Centre UI loads with user consent info
Modify cookie and DPDPA consent preferences
Submit updated consents
Consent changes are saved and reflected in backend
Navigate to Rights Requests section
Submit a Data Access and Deletion request
Request is submitted successfully and acknowledgment received

title: Settings Profile Update and Security 2FA Enablement
description: Validate updating user profile details and enabling/disabling two-factor authentication from settings.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → Settings → Profile Tab
Update profile information and save changes
Profile details are updated correctly
Go to Security Tab and enable 2FA
Complete 2FA setup with authenticator app or SMS
2FA is enabled and works on next login attempt

title: Subscription Payment Processing via Razorpay
description: Confirm subscriptions can be purchased using Razorpay with successful payment and invoice generation.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard → Settings → Billing Tab
Select subscription plan and initiate payment
Complete Razorpay payment flow successfully
Payment is processed and invoice is generated and accessible

title: Error Handling - Invalid Login Credentials
description: Verify system properly rejects login attempts with invalid credentials and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Input valid email and incorrect password
Click Login button
Login fails with error message indicating invalid credentials

title: Error Handling - Expired Email Verification Link
description: Ensure expired or invalid email verification links are handled gracefully with clear instructions.

steps.description: Attempt to verify email using expired or malformed verification link
System shows a clear message about the expired/invalid link and provides next steps

title: Performance - API Response Time Below 500ms
description: Validate that key API endpoints respond within 500 milliseconds under normal load conditions.

steps.description: Execute requests to critical APIs: authentication, consent submission, cookie scanning
Each API responds within 500ms on average during testing

title: Performance - Consent Widget Load Time Under 1 second
description: Ensure the DPDPA consent widget loads and renders fully within 1 second on supported devices and networks.

steps.description: Embed DPDPA consent widget on a test website
Load the test website on various devices and network conditions
Widget load time is recorded under 1 second consistently

title: Accessibility and Localization - Multi-language Support and WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Confirm all user interfaces support switching among 22 Indian languages and conform to WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

steps.description: Switch UI language through settings to each supported Indian language one by one
All UI text is translated and no untranslated segments appear
Use screen readers, keyboard navigation, and color contrast analyzers on key pages
UI meets WCAG 2.1 AA criteria without blocking usability

title: Onboarding Wizard Multi-step User Flow
description: Test that new users completing onboarding wizard experience seamless navigation through all steps and final dashboard access.

steps.description: Log in as a new user redirected to onboarding wizard
Complete each step of the wizard with valid inputs
Next steps appear correctly and no errors occur
Finish onboarding wizard
Dashboard loads successfully at completion

title: Consent Data Persistence and Recovery
description: Verify that consent data is stored reliably and can be recovered accurately after logout or session expiration.

steps.description: Submit consents using the widget on a test website
Log out and log back in
Access consent records through Dashboard → DPDPA → Records
Previously submitted consents appear complete and accurate

title: Rate Limiting Middleware Functionality
description: Test the rate limiting middleware blocks excessive API requests and returns appropriate error codes.

steps.description: Send rapid repeated API requests exceeding allowed limit
System blocks requests and responds with rate limit exceeded error
